name: World's Hardest (multiplayer) Game
description:
This is a fan-game, and not official.

This is the World's Hardest (multiplayer rivalry) Game, where you and a friend play against each other to beat an impossible style level. Currently there are 9 levels, but more are to come.

You can also pick from 6 skins each with a style:

  • Classic
  • Monochrome
  • Mario Bros
  • Bloons
  • Cards
  • Bugs

This game is not intended for one person, as it is very crap without another person.
